mapper.select: update INSBSpecialkindconfig set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},typecode = #{typecode},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},kindcode = #{kindcode},codekey = #{codekey},codevalue = #{codevalue},prop1 = #{prop1},prop2 = #{prop2} where id = #{id}
select * from INSBSpecialkindconfig where taskid = #{taskid} and inscomcode = #{inscomcode}
